languages.text: Приказал{mf||а} включить тассерций в десятину, чтобы затаенная в нем скверна распространилась по Империуму.
Ordered that the thassertium be included in the tithe, so that the corruption it hides might spread throughout the Imperium.
languages.original_text: Приказал{mf||а} включить тассерций в десятину, чтобы затаенная в нем скверна распространилась по Империуму.

traits.locale_text: Commanded to include thassertium into the tithe so that the corruption it hides would spread all over Imperium.
Commanded to include thassertium into the tithe so that the corruption it hides would spread all over Imperium.

languages.text: Angeordnet, das Thassertim in den Zehnt aufzunehmen, um die darin verborgene Verderbtheit in das gesamte Imperium zu tragen.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the thassertium be included in the tithe, so that the corruption it hides might spread throughout the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Angeordnet, das Thassertim in den Zehnt aufzunehmen, um die darin verborgene Verderbtheit in das gesamte Imperium zu tragen.

languages.text: Vous avez ordonné que le thassertium soit ajouté à la dîme pour que la corruption qu'il renferme puisse se répandre dans l'Imperium.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the thassertium be included in the tithe, so that the corruption it hides might spread throughout the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez ordonné que le thassertium soit ajouté à la dîme pour que la corruption qu'il renferme puisse se répandre dans l'Imperium.

languages.text: 你下令将塔瑟拉水晶包含在帝国什一税的清单中。这样一来，它隐藏的腐化就可能会在整个帝国之中蔓延。
languages.original_text: Ordered that the thassertium be included in the tithe, so that the corruption it hides might spread throughout the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 你下令将塔瑟拉水晶包含在帝国什一税的清单中。这样一来，它隐藏的腐化就可能会在整个帝国之中蔓延。

languages.text: Has ordenado que el thassertio se incluya en el diezmo para que la corrupción que oculta se extienda por el Imperium.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the thassertium be included in the tithe, so that the corruption it hides might spread throughout the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Has ordenado que el thassertio se incluya en el diezmo para que la corrupción que oculta se extienda por el Imperium.

languages.text: タッセリウムを租税に含めるよう命じた。そうすることで、内に秘められた腐敗が帝国中に広がってしまうかもしれない。
languages.original_text: Ordered that the thassertium be included in the tithe, so that the corruption it hides might spread throughout the Imperium.

traits.locale_text: タッセリウムを租税に含めるよう命じた。そうすることで、内に秘められた腐敗が帝国中に広がってしまうかもしれない。

languages.text: Sakladığı yozluğun tüm İmparatorluk'a yayılması için tasertiyumun aşara dâhil edilmesini emrettin.
languages.original_text: Ordered that the thassertium be included in the tithe, so that the corruption it hides might spread throughout the Imperium.
